turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm calling to check on the status of my claim, number 2023-449-Alpha. I submitted it almost two weeks ago and haven't heard anything!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for calling. Please allow me a moment to access claim 2023-449-Alpha. Okay, I see it here. It's currently in the review stage. We're waiting on some documentation from the repair shop.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: The *repair shop*? But I sent you guys all the paperwork they gave me, including the estimate! What documentation are they missing?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: It appears we are missing the itemized breakdown of the labor costs. Could you contact the repair shop and ask them to forward that to us? Our fax number is 555-123-4567 or they can email it to claims@exampleinsurance.com.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, seriously? This is such a hassle. Okay, I'll call them. But what if they refuse? What then?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: If the repair shop is unwilling to provide the itemized breakdown, we can attempt to contact them directly on your behalf. However, obtaining the information directly from you or the shop will expedite the process. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I guess not... thanks for at least letting me know what's going on. Hopefully, I can get that information to you quickly. Goodbye.
